title: Privacy Policy
introduction: Welcome to Base64s.com. Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

information_collection.title: Information We Collect
information_collection.account: Account information (name, email, etc.) for account management and support.
information_collection.usage: Usage details (features used, frequency, etc.) to improve our service.
information_collection.device: Device information (type, OS, browser) for compatibility and optimization.
information_collection.cookies: Cookies to enhance your experience and remember preferences.
information_collection.payment: Payment and billing information for processing transactions.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.desc: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data, but no method is 100% secure.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.desc: We do not sell your data. We may share it to comply with laws, protect rights, or with trusted partners under confidentiality.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.desc: We may update this policy. Changes are effective when posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have any questions, please contact us. By using Base64s.com, you agree to this policy.
